en-US.title: Howard Brown Health: Clark Street Location
en-US.description: Howard Brown Health is a clinic serving the LGBTQ community, with a particular emphasis on transgender health and well-being. The Clark Street office in Chicago offers a multitude of services, from general health to mental health, substance recovery, and sexual health. They offer specialized services tailored to the needs of the transgender community, including insurance navigation, gender-affirming care, STI prevention, and HIV support services. They aim to provide safe, respectful, and comprehensive care to all.

address: 6500 N Clark St, Chicago, IL 60626, USA
